summary: Josefina's personal journey back to Nuremberg, Germany, where she arrived as an immigrant from Spain being only 18, along with other 2 million Spaniards who left to Europe in order to find a future.
cast: Josefina Cembrero|Leonor Mediavilla|Victoria Toro|Josefina Pérez|Pedro Serrano|Virginia Serrano|José Luis Leal|Juan Chacón|Heinz Saidel|Hans Peter Steber|Hedi Stoinski|Álvaro Rengifo|Victor Gano|Fernando Reinlein
title: El tren de la memoria
